scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki performs 'SUPER HELIX' on stage with a live band.
MC section. Fubuki catches her breath and greets the live audience and online viewers.

subtitles.original: ...輝きまで
subtitles.english: ...until the radiance.

subtitles.original: この全身全霊の一生いっぱいの感情よ 届け
subtitles.english: May these wholehearted, lifelong emotions reach you!

subtitles.original: 君だけが愛してくれたから
subtitles.english: Because only you loved me,

subtitles.original: 君を愛してるから
subtitles.english: because I love you,

subtitles.original: 切なさの今が煌めいてく
subtitles.english: the painful present is starting to sparkle.

subtitles.original: 千の星空を見上げ
subtitles.english: Looking up at a thousand starry skies,

subtitles.original: 超新星のスピードで
subtitles.english: at the speed of a supernova,

subtitles.original: 閃光のように 今会いにいく
subtitles.english: like a flash of light, I'm coming to see you now.

subtitles.original: フィアリーナにキングが帰ってきたぞ！
subtitles.english: The King has returned to Fialina!

subtitles.original: 国民のみんな、まだ声出し足りないよね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, you haven't shouted enough yet, have you!

subtitles.original: いけるよね！
subtitles.english: You can do it, right!

subtitles.original: アリーナ！
subtitles.english: Arena!

subtitles.original: アリーナ！
subtitles.english: Arena!

subtitles.original: スタンド！
subtitles.english: Stand!

subtitles.original: スタンド！
subtitles.english: Stand!
3rd Floor!
3rd Floor!

subtitles.original: そして今この配信を見てくれてるみんな！
subtitles.english: And everyone watching this stream right now!

subtitles.original: せーの！
subtitles.english: Ready, set...

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: みんなー！
subtitles.english: Everyone!

subtitles.original: はあ、やばい、もうやばいんですけども、
subtitles.english: Whoa, this is crazy! It's already crazy...

subtitles.original: みなさん、改めてまして...
subtitles.english: ...Everyone, once again...

subtitles.original: こんこんきつねー！
subtitles.english: Konkon-kitsune!

subtitles.original: ホロライブ1期生、ゲーマーズ兼、みんなの王様、白上フブキです！
subtitles.english: Hololive 1st Gen & Gamers, and your King, Shirakami Fubuki!

subtitles.original: いや、待ちに待ったこの日が、ついにやってきましたよ！
subtitles.english: Wow, this long-awaited day has finally arrived!

subtitles.original: うわー、すごかった、みんな、3曲連続だけど
subtitles.english: Whoa, that was amazing. Everyone, we did 3 songs in a row but

subtitles.original: よくついてこれましたね、すごかった、流石です！
subtitles.english: you kept up well. It was amazing, as expected!

subtitles.original: いやもう白上もさ、みんなの声聞きながらもう煽っていくしかねえと
subtitles.english: I felt like I had to keep firing you up while listening to your voices.

subtitles.original: 負けじ負けじとね、みんなも声出していけーって感じで
subtitles.english: Not wanting to be outdone, I was like "Keep those voices coming!"

subtitles.original: ねー、もう素晴らしかったです、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: It was just wonderful. Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ふう、ちょっとね、お水も飲みたいんですけども
subtitles.english: Phew, I want to drink some water, but...

subtitles.original: 今日はですね、まああの、FBKINGDOM、建国祝祭みたいな感じなんですけども
subtitles.english: Today is like the Founding Festival of FBKINGDOM...

subtitles.original: みんな今日、FBKINGDOMに入国ってちょっと思ってませんか？
subtitles.english: Do you all think you're "entering" FBKINGDOM today?

subtitles.original: 思ってる？もしや。
subtitles.english: Do you? Perhaps?

subtitles.original: いや、違うよみんな。
subtitles.english: No, you're wrong.

subtitles.original: ここはもうFBKINGDOMからみんなの実家だから、おかえり！
subtitles.english: This is FBKINGDOM, which is your home, so welcome back!

subtitles.original: そう、そうだよ、みんなは帰ってきたんだ、この国に。
subtitles.english: That's right, exactly. You've come back to this country.

subtitles.original: ね、ちょっともう一回やろうかみんな。
subtitles.english: Let's do it one more time.

subtitles.original: おかえりー！
subtitles.english: Welcome back!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！もっとね、この後もいっぱい歌う予定なので
subtitles.english: Thank you! I'm planning to sing many more songs after this, so

subtitles.original: もっとね、声たくさん聞かせてくださいね！
subtitles.english: please let me hear your voices even more!

subtitles.original: そしてですね、本日は、素敵な演奏でライブを盛り上げてくれる
subtitles.english: And also, today we have

subtitles.original: バンドメンバーたちが、いらっしゃいます！
subtitles.english: the band members here who are livening up the concert!

subtitles.original: かっこいい！もうね、最高の音楽ですね
subtitles.english: So cool! It's the best music.

subtitles.original: このフィアリーナ、全身で浴びてください、いぇーい！
subtitles.english: Please soak up this "Fialina" with your whole body! Yay!

subtitles.original: はい、今回のライブなんですけども、なんと海外でもね、ライブビューイングさせていただいております！
subtitles.english: We're also having live viewings overseas for this concert!

subtitles.original: Hi friends! 見てる？
subtitles.english: Hi friends! Are you watching?

subtitles.original: 配信のD席のみんな！
subtitles.english: Everyone in the online D-seats!

subtitles.original: ライブビューイングの皆もね、Enjoy FBKINGDOM ANTHEM!
subtitles.english: Everyone at the live viewings, Enjoy FBKINGDOM ANTHEM!

subtitles.original: いっぱいね、最後まで見てって下さい！
subtitles.english: Please watch until the very end!

subtitles.original: ほう、そして、D席のみんなもよお見えとるぞい
subtitles.english: Ho, and I can see everyone in the D-seats well too.

subtitles.original: みんなもアピールして、ほら。
subtitles.english: Everyone, show yourselves, come on.

subtitles.original: 会場のみんなもD席のみんなにイェーイって、イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Everyone at the venue, say "Yay" to the D-seats! Yay!

subtitles.original: コメントとかもしっかり見てますので
subtitles.english: I'm also keeping a close eye on the comments, so

subtitles.original: ちゃんと皆さん、コメントもいっぱい、いっぱいして下さいね、お願いします！
subtitles.english: please leave lots and lots of comments. Please!
